en.00001: üëã Hello friend! My name is Andy and I will help you get data from various social networks. üîó Just send a link to the content from the social networks available to me. üìã You can get acquainted with them here - /help

en.00036:
Describe in detail the error or bug that you encountered and what actions you performed that caused the error. You can also write your suggestions and ideas. To send, write the text after the /issue command. Example:
/issue I encountered a problem with...
en.help: ‚úÖ ‚ÄúScraping is a way to automatically collect information from websites.‚Äù The bot collects all information from available social networks - just send a link to the desired content. ‚¨áÔ∏è Available social networks: ‚Ä¢ TikTok - videos, slideshows, profiles, music, hashtags, stories; ‚Ä¢ Instagram - posts with videos and photos, carousels, reels, profiles, stories, highlights, music, locations, hashtags; ü§ùüèº The bot also works great in groups. Convert links into content without leaving Telegram.
